desc:
Flurries drift from the body of this gigantic humanoid seemingly crafted from snow. Its simple clothes are almost pointless, and it carries a massive icicle as a club._  
**Subservient to Frost Giants.** Snow giants inhabit the same territory as Open Game License
name: Snow Giant

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The snow giant makes two club attacks.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Giant Snowball
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity save or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The snow giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Snow Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The snow giant regains 5 hp at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp and it is in snowy terrain.
